On [[3 May]] [[1957]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote a letter to '''Charles Blackwood'''.
*'''Subject:''' Dwarven linguistics.
*'''Publication:''' None. Appeared in an episode of [[wikipedia:Antiques Roadshow|Antiques Roadshow]] aired in 2021.
